titles.title: I Am Covered Over By The Robes Of Righteousness

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I am covered over by the robes of righteousness
That Jesus gives to me, he gives to me.
I am covered over by the precious blood of Jesus
And He lives in me, lives in me.
What a joy it is to know my Heavenly Father loves me so
He sets me free, sets me free.
When He looks at me He sees not what I used to be
But He sees Jesus.
